name: Syndicat de la Presse Quotidienne Régionale
memberOrga: Syndicat de la Presse Quotidienne Départementale (SPQD)
goal: Our goals are focused on defending our members who are all the french daily regional newspapers and their information websites.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: We follow EU initiatives concerning VAT, Public Procurement, Legal information, Copyright, Medias, Online Privacy, Google and all that concerns Printed industry
